text:
Mourad Merwan Rim (born 13 July 1977) is a French actor and singer-songwriter. He was born in Sarcelles, Paris. He played François, Duke of Beaufort in the musical "Le Roi Soleil". He also played a number of roles in the musical "Mozart L'Opéra-Rock". His first album, "L'échappée", was released in 2012.
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Rim tested positive for COVID-19.
